text: Advance to the Rear is a 1964 American western comedy movie directed by George Marshall and was based on the 1957 novel Company of Cowards by Jack Schaefer. It stars Glenn Ford, Stella Stevens, Melvyn Douglas, Jim Backus, Joan Blondell, Andrew Prine, Alan Hale Jr., Whit Bissell and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 comedy movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by George Marshall
title: Advance to the Rear
